Title: PDP - Instead of values in the "warranty" field, the code is displayed
Action: 1. Open https://ngw-sandbox.lighthouselabs.eu/de/-----/auto/alle-fahrzeuge.html 2. Click on "Volkswagen Golf Variant Comfortline" 3. Scroll to "warranty.label"
Actual: Instead of values in the "warranty" field, the code is displayed
